1370: Clementia was born in De Tuyt in 1370.
Got married to Jurre at age 15 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1371 at age 16.
1372: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1372 at age 17.
1373: Gave birth to Breghlent in 1373 at age 18.
1374: Gave birth to Erkenradis in 1374 at age 19.
1375: Gave birth to Ghodscalc in 1375 at age 20.
1376: Gave birth to Aue in 1376 at age 21.
1377: Gave birth to Geykonis in 1377 at age 22.
Lost daughter Erkenradis when Erkenradis was 4 years old.
1380: Gave birth to Wein in 1380 at age 25.
Lost son Wein when Wein was 1 years old.
1381: Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 16 years old.
1392: Lost daughter Breghlent when Breghlent was 20 years old.
